Geography, Environmental Studies & Archaeology.

Research activities in Geography and Environmental Sciences cover two major research and impact themes:

  • Heritage, Conflict and Society
  • Environmental Processes and Management

  Find out more    

Shifting perceptions at national & international levels.

OU geographical and environmental research is shifting perceptions and changing policy on issues of key importance, at local, national and international levels.

Key stats

  • Top 100% of xxx within 5 years
  • Top 100% of xxx within 5 years
  • Top 100% of xxx within 5 years

Research groups

We are passionate about our research, our five research groups listed below carry out cutting edge research on a range of topics.

  • Centre for Maritime Archaeology
  • Coastal Systems
  • Freshwater Sciences
  • Quaternary Environmental Change
  • Human Environments
